title: UCLA’s Football Wins Can’t Mask Its Financial Woes
description: The Bruins are having their best recent season on the field, yet attendance is falling rapidly. Free tickets haven’t helped, and the athletic department’s balance sheet has suffered.
dc:creator: Billy Witz

media:content.media:credit: Gary A. Vasquez/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:content.media:description: Tarps covered empty seats during U.C.L.A.’s home opener in September.
